item.description: Biography I am currently a Senior Research Scientist with Huawei Technologies, working on Computer Vision and Machine Learning problems. Recent research directions include multi-task learning, computational photography and meta-learning. Previously I held postdoctoral positions with the Biomedical Image Analysis Group, Imperial College London, working with Prof. Ben Glocker, Dr. Bernhard Kainz and Prof. Daniel Rueckert and, prior to that, with Disney Research Zurich working on real-time facial performance capture. I earned my PhD at the University of Edinburgh in the Institute of Perception, Action and Behaviour under the supervision of Prof.
